Locksmiths in Essex

Essex stretches from the London borders to the coast. Our directory connects you with verified locksmiths serving Chelmsford, Colchester, Southend, and beyond.

Frequently asked questions

How quickly can a locksmith arrive in Essex?

Response times vary by location and time of day. In urban areas, emergency locksmiths typically arrive within 30-60 minutes. In more rural areas, expect 60-90 minutes for emergency call-outs.

What does a locksmith call-out cost in Essex?

Standard call-out fees range from £60-£90 during business hours. Emergency or out-of-hours services typically cost £90-£150. Final costs depend on the work required and parts needed.

Are all Essex locksmiths DBS checked?

Not automatically. We verify DBS checks for locksmiths who provide them, and these are clearly marked on their profiles. We recommend choosing DBS-checked locksmiths for added peace of mind.
